columns.text: Aplai Dome is a new hotel built in absolute accordance with the traditional Santorinian style. In absolute harmony with island’s architecture Aplai Dome is built in Oia’ s area. It is only 170 meters far from Oia’s centre where you can admire the unique and worldwide known Caldera of Santorini and at the same time to visit high aesthetic shops, cafes, bars and restaurants. In very close distance and only 2 kilometers from Aplai Dome is the exotic and known for its volcanic rocks Kouloymbos beach, the organized beach Baxe and for the more adventurous of you one kilometer far from Aplai Dome is the Ammodi, the old port of Santorini, with a lot of traditional fish taverns and the Sant Nikolas island which challenge you to dive in the blue Aegean sea. In the center of the Aplai Dome complex dominates a minimalist design swimming pool with hydromassage, while its rooms have a private veranda with stunning views of the sunset of Oia and the endless blue of the Aegean Sea. Aplai Dome is 10 km from Fira Town, 12 km from the port and 11 km from the airport. It has luxurious facilities like spa, gym, air conditioning, wi-fi, TV, fridge, sink, electric hotplate, safe box, hairdryer. The wonderful pool area is ideal for relaxing moments and for enjoying your breakfast with coffee, snacks, drinks, sunbathing all day long or reading under the umbrellas until the evening, when the sun falls into the blue of the Aegean Sea.

items.title: Cloud 9
items.description: Heavenly moments of amazing vacations are waiting for you and your loved ones at Cloud 9 which is nestled in the heart of the colorful volcanic rocks of the famous Caldera, just 400 m above the sea level.Only a few minutes away from the cosmopolitan capital of Santorini island, the two villas are fully equipped with all the facilities you ever dreamed of, offering comfort and satisfaction. These two luxurious villas feature a minimalistic modern decor, mixing high class facilities and breathtaking sea views. Each suite is stylishly decorated while both possess a heated outdoor Jacuzzi and a heated swimming pool. At Ariadne villa you may also choose among two heated swimming pools, one indoor and one outdoor plus a steam room that provides you with memorable moments of warmth.If you wish to step out of the ordinary in a magic world of lavishness, Cloud 9 suites are the place to awaken your senses, granting you with a wide range of amenities for an even sweeter accommodation!
items.excerpt: Only a few minutes away from the cosmopolitan capital of Santorini island, the two villas are fully equipped with all the facilities you ever dreamed of, offering comfort and satisfaction.

amenities.item: Two amazing villas nestled on the highest point of Caldera
Private sea view terrace with double day bed, chairs and table (Both Villas)

tabs.title: Good to Know:
tabs.description: Each suite is stylishly decorated while both possess a heated outdoor Jacuzzi and a heated swimming pool.

items.title: Amber Light Villas
items.description: Curved in the mountain, the Amber Light Villas offers the combination of comfortable villas opening to private terraces and balconies with stunning views to the Aegean Sea along with the hotel comforts, services and facilities. Amber Light Villas are located on the east side of the famous village of Imerovigli, just above the beaches of Koloumbos and Pori. It is Just 6 km from Fira, 13 km from the airport, km from the port. Welcome to Santorini and Amber Light Villas. Welcome to a brand new suites complex with hotel facilities at the east side of the island! Inspired by the amber light of the sun rising above the sea just in front of your suite, we created a holiday treat for all your senses. The comfort, the unique allure of the landscape, the privacy, the tastes and the spa treatments are just some of the elements that will make your holidays in Santorini utterly beautiful and unforgettable.
items.excerpt: Curved in the mountain, the Amber Light Villas offers the combination of comfortable villas opening to private terraces and balconies with stunning views to the Aegean Sea along with the hotel comforts, services and facilities.

amenities.item: 21 independent and private suites and villas
Fresh water Swimming pool with sun-loungers
